definition: row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
asteroid belt between Mars and Jupiter

sentences.english: Lutetia has been a mystery for many years.
sentences.chinese: 小行星Lutetia許多年來一直是個迷。

sentences.english: Meteorites are asteroid fragments that fall to the ground.
sentences.chinese: 隕石是掉落地球的小行星殘骸。

sentences.english: Thereare three different types of asteroids.
The x-ray intensity suggests it had the mass of a small planet.
sentences.chinese: 這束X射線的強度暗示，它具有小行星的質量。

sentences.english: Or it could be because the K-T boundary that marks the geologic end of the dinosaurs is laced with iridium; the metal is more common in asteroids and meteorites than in the Earth’s crust.
sentences.chinese: 與地殼相比，這種金屬在小行星和隕石中更常見。

sentences.english: Mining metals from asteroids seems a bonkers idea. But could it work?
sentences.chinese: 小行星採礦這想法聽似瘋狂，但行得通嗎？

sentences.english: Our system is also useful for asteroid occultations and gamma-ray burst afterglows.
sentences.chinese: 我們的系統也適合觀測小行星掩星以及迦瑪爆餘暉源。

sentences.english: The asteroids we see today are the leftovers from this chaotic period.
sentences.chinese: 我們今天看到的小行星是從這個混亂時期的剩飯剩菜。

sentences.english: An asteroid seeding issue in the G5KW region has been addressed.
sentences.chinese: G5KW星域的小行星帶刷新問題已經提交。

sentences.english: Perhaps, extinctions are caused by something outside, like comets and asteroids.
sentences.chinese: 也許，滅絕是由外來物體引起的，比如彗星和小行星。

sentences.english: The asteroid would hit Earth in less than a day.
sentences.chinese: 小行星會在不到一天的時間內撞擊地球。

sentences.english: Eros is one of the planetoids which passes near the earth every now and then .
sentences.chinese: 愛神星是一個時常靠近地球的小行星。

sentences.english: This conclusion is consistent with the hypothesis that the rotational axis of the minor planet has no precession.
sentences.chinese: 這個結論和小行星自轉軸不進動的假定是一致的。

sentences.english: Star gazers can find Nadal's asteroid between Mars and Jupiter and the 22-year-old has himself been invited to the Majorcan observatory to view it himself.
sentences.chinese: “納達爾”小行星位於火星和木星之間。

sentences.english: To Spahr, it seemed apparent that a large asteroid was barreling toward Earth.
sentences.chinese: 史巴爾立即人定有顆大體積的小行星正向地球衝來。

sentences.english: The asteroid's mass determines the strength of its gravitational pull.
sentences.chinese: 小行星的質量決定了它的引力大小。

definition: asteroid belt between Mars and Jupiter
Phobos (moon of Mars), aka Mars I
Titan (moon of Saturn), aka Saturn VI
